source.description: Data about a filesystem represented in XML.

test-case.name: NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc001
test-case.description: Test function fn:namespace-uri-from-QName. Using QName element as input

test-case.name: NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc002
test-case.description: Test function fn:namespace-uri-from-QName. Using QName attribute as input

test-case.name: NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc003
test-case.description: Test function fn:namespace-uri-from-QName. Using element derived from QName as input

test-case.name: NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc004
test-case.description: Test function fn:namespace-uri-from-QName. Using attribute derived from QName as input

test-case.name: NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc005
test-case.description: Test function fn:namespace-uri-from-QName. Check return type of function is xs:NCName

test-case.name: NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc006
test-case.description: Test function fn:namespace-uri-from-QName. Empty sequence literal as input

test-case.name: NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc007
test-case.description: Test function fn:namespace-uri-from-QName. Empty sequence literal as input

test-case.name: NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc009
test-case.description: Test function fn:namespace-uri-from-QName. Error case - invalid parameter type (string)

test-case.name: NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc010
test-case.description: Test function fn:namespace-uri-from-QName. Error case - multiple input values

test-case.name: NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc011
test-case.description: Test function fn:namespace-uri-from-QName. Error case - no input parameter

test-case.name: NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc012
test-case.description: Test function fn:namespace-uri-from-QName. Error case - typo in function name

test-case.name: NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc013
test-case.description: Test function fn:namespace-uri-from-QName. Error case - typo in function name

test-case.name: NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc014
test-case.description: Test function fn:namespace-uri-from-QName. Error case - typo in function name

test-case.name: NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc015
test-case.description: Test function fn:namespace-uri-from-QName. Error case - invalid parameter type (simple type)

test-case.name: NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc015a
test-case.description: Test function fn:namespace-uri-from-QName. Error case - invalid parameter type (simple type)

test-case.name: NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc016
test-case.description: Test function fn:namespace-uri-from-QName. Error case - invalid parameter type (integer)

test-case.name: NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc017
test-case.description: Test function fn:namespace-uri-from-QName. Error case - invalid parameter type (time)

test-case.name: NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc018
test-case.description: Test function fn:namespace-uri-from-QName. Explicit call to data to extract simple typed QName value

test-case.name: NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc019
test-case.description: Test function fn:namespace-uri-from-QName. Conditional expression as parameter where both branches result in QName value
test-case.test: fn:namespace-uri-from-QName( if( true() ) then fn:QName("http://www.example.com/urn", exactly-one(xs:string((/root/elemQN[1])))) else fn:QName("http://www.example.com/urn", exactly-one(xs:string((/root/@attrQN))[1])) )

test-case.name: NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc020
test-case.description: Test function fn:namespace-uri-from-QName. Conditional expression as parameter where both branches result in QName value
test-case.test: fn:namespace-uri-from-QName( if( false() ) then fn:QName("http://www.example.com/urn", exactly-one(xs:string((/root/elemQN)[1]))) else fn:QName("http://www.example.com/urn", exactly-one(xs:string((/root/@attrQN)[1]))) )

test-case.name: NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc021
test-case.description: Test function fn:namespace-uri-from-QName. Conditional expression as parameter where one branch does NOT result in a QName value

modified.change: Added schemeImport dependency. See bug issue #21238
Recombined the 1.0 and 3.0 tests as the error code is the same in both cases; see bug 22416. They were previously split as a result of bug 21723.

test-case.name: K-NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `namespace-uri-from-QName()`.

test-case.name: K-NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `namespace-uri-from-QName(1, 2)`.

test-case.name: K-NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(namespace-uri-from-QName( () ))`.

test-case.name: K-NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `namespace-uri-from-QName( QName("example.com/", "pre:lname")) eq xs:anyURI("example.com/")`.

test-case.name: K-NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `namespace-uri-from-QName( QName("example.com/", "pre:lname")) instance of xs:anyURI`.

test-case.name: K2-NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc-1
test-case.description: Test that xmlns declarations in direct element constructors are honored in embedded expressions.
test-case.test: declare namespace ns = "http://example.com/ANamespace"; string(<name xmlns:ns="http://example.com/BNamespace">{namespace-uri-from-QName("ns:foo" cast as xs:QName)}</name>)

test-case.name: K2-NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc-2
test-case.description: Check that the default element namespace is picked up with computed element constructors.

test-case.name: K2-NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc-3
test-case.description: Check that xmlns declarations overrides.

test-case.name: K2-NamespaceURIFromQNameFunc-4
test-case.description: Check that xmlns declarations overrides(#2).
